article.body:
Acknowledgments

 

 

The translation of the texts in the Energy Dossier – published in Estudos Avançados (v.21, n.59, jan./apr. 2007), a journal issued every four months by the Institute of Advanced Studies of the University of São Paulo – has been made possible due to Petrobras Cultural Support.

The English version of the texts will have free unrestricted access at the Scientific Electronic Library Online (SciELO), an electronic library covering a selected collection of Brazilian scientific journals. Estudos Avançados’ homepage at Scielo is:

<http://www.scielo.br/scielo.php?script=sci_serial&lng=pt&pid=0103-4014>

From now on, the international scientific community will be able to have a clearer idea of the present situation of energy related issues in Brazil.

We would like to thank the translators Brian Stirner, Carlos Malferrari and Rodrigo Sardenberg for their contributions; Cecília Mattos for the accuracy in the revision and Sóstenes Costa for formatting the texts.
In Memoriam: Alberto Luiz da Rocha Barros, Erasmo Garcia Mendes, José Paulo Paes, Michel Debrun e Raymundo Faoro.
